name: No More Mr. Dice Guy (VeryCleverName3)
description:
Mr. Dice Guy has 4 abilities, each of which is only activated when rotating him to the correct side:

1 - Jump

2 - Dash

3 - Glide

4 - Shoot

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Rotate Left: Left Click or Z

Rotate Right: Right Click or X

Abilities refresh upon touching the ground
